item.description:
Aragosta   (http://www.aragostabistro.com) means lobster in Italian and this restaurant has a number of offerings with lobster in them. Everyone will be able to choose from either the brunch or lunch menu at this event. http://www.aragostabistro.com/Userfiles/Aragosta/Menus/BRUNCH.pdf The restaurant is right on the waterfront in the Fairmont Battery Wharf Hotel. If the weather is good, we'll dine outside, where they have a large outdoor cafe overlooking the harbor. Prices for lunch are: sandwiches $13-19 (come with salad + fries) Other entrees $9-16 Brunch $12-19. 

If you get there before 1:00, join us for a drink at the inside bar. It would be best to bring cash, as we won't get separate checks.  

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar until 1:00. Ask for Jim's table after that.
item.name: Aragosta Bar & Bistro-Lunch/Brunch
